mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Rosburry, John
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Forrester Sannaute @ Michigan [possibly Forester Township in Sanilac Co.?]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Rosburry, John Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gunshot wound of [right] shoulder [flesh] musket bullet which entered near the axilliary border of scapula 1/2 inch from border of latissimus dorsi muscle passing a little obliquely [?]wards and forewards to exit at [word illegible] aspect of humerus [several words illegible] border of axilla. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
